testsuite.name: TestCase.TestScript_004
testsuite.system-out: The Status code of the HttpResponse received against Http-Put request is the same as expected : 200 The Response Body received against Http-Put request is : {"name":"morpheus","job":"leader","updatedAt":"2024-04-03T13:09:32.414Z"} The actualJobOfUser_Morpheus in the jsonPayload of ResponseBody received against Http-Put request is the same as expected as the ActualJobOfUser_Morpheus is :leader whereas the ExpectedJobOfUser_Morpheus is : leader The information of the user is updated through HTTP-Put request at : 2024-04-03T13:09:32.414Z
